1. Conventions¶

This document explains conventions and other importnt structural information.

1.1. 74 Char Limit¶

74 characters includin py and rst Stuff is ordered alphabetically where possible. This includes attribute-, method-, class-, etc names. Should there be a dependency, the item (stuff) are moved to the bottom, in alphabetical order, to accommodate the dependency.
